title: Refactor build.sh for multi-distro support
description:
Modify build.sh to support both Debian-based and Arch-based distributions:
- Replace dpkg --print-architecture with uname -m for universal arch detection
- Add distro family detection using /etc/os-release (debian, arch, etc.)
- Remove hard /etc/debian_version check
- Add pacman dependency installation alongside apt
- Add 'arch' to valid build formats
- Update help text and validation

title: Add Arch Linux Package Support
description: Expand the build system to support Arch Linux packages (.pkg.tar.zst) alongside existing .deb and AppImage formats. This epic covers refactoring build.sh for multi-distro support, creating the Arch packaging script, CI/CD integration with Docker containers, and documentation updates.

title: Update README with Arch installation instructions
description:
Add Arch Linux documentation to README.md:
- Installation via pacman -U
- Building from source on Arch
- Any Arch-specific notes or requirements

title: Update ci.yml for Arch builds
description:
Update main CI workflow to include Arch package builds:
- Add build-arch-amd64 and build-arch-arm64 jobs
- Update release job dependencies
- Add artifact download steps for Arch packages
- Include .pkg.tar.zst in GitHub releases

title: Test Arch package build on Arch host and Docker
description:
Verify the implementation works correctly:
- Test local build on Arch/EndeavourOS host
- Test Docker-based build on Ubuntu
- Verify package installs correctly
- Verify application launches and functions properly

title: Create scripts/build-arch-package.sh
description:
Create new packaging script for Arch Linux packages:
- Mirror structure of build-deb-package.sh
- Create staged directory structure (usr/bin, usr/lib, usr/share)
- Generate launcher script with X11/Wayland detection
- Create PKGBUILD file with proper metadata
- Create .install file for post_install hooks
- Run makepkg to produce .pkg.tar.zst

title: Create .github/workflows/build-arch.yml
description:
Create reusable GitHub Actions workflow for Arch builds:
- Use archlinux:base-devel Docker container
- Create non-root builder user (makepkg requirement)
- Install dependencies via pacman
- Run build.sh --build arch
- Upload .pkg.tar.zst artifacts
- Support both amd64 and arm64 architectures
